magpie.analytics

Class RegressionStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.analytics.BaseStatistics
      • magpie.analytics.RegressionStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Commandable, Options, Printable, Savable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TargetRegressionStatistics

    public class RegressionStatistics
extends BaseStatistics
    This class contains methods to calculate statistics about regression models.
    See Also:
